        Displays a single ValueTilePositions tileValue.
        Parameters:
        tilePosition - the TilePosition whose strength is being shown.
        value - the value of the TilePosition.
        displayColor - the color which the position is going to be marked with.

      • findHighestValueOFTilePosition

        private static java.lang.Integer findHighestValueOFTilePosition(java.util.HashMap<bwapi.TilePosition,java.lang.Integer> valueTable)
        Function used to find the highest value in a given table of TilePositions mapped to Integers. Value needed for a linear interpolation of the color.
        Parameters:
        valueTable - List of all ValueTilePositions taken in consideration.
        Returns:
        the highest Integer value of the table or null if none is found.
